title: Barcode Flow for Merchants
description: Connecting with Patrons using our Barcode Flow requires the Patron to present a Barcode and the merchant integration to scan it in order to create a Payment Request.

children.value: Connecting with Patrons using our Barcode Flow requires the Patron to present a Barcode and the merchant integration to scan it in order to
The sequence diagram below indicates the expected flow of behavior between the Patron, the Point of Sale (POS) and Centrapay.

props.code:
sequenceDiagram
    autonumber

    participant Patron
    participant POS
    participant Centrapay

    Note over Patron: Present Barcode
    Patron->>POS: Scan Barcode

    POS->>Centrapay: Create Payment Request with Barcode

    par
        loop
            POS->>Centrapay: Poll for Payment Confirmation
        end

        Patron->>Centrapay: Pay Payment Request
    end

    Note over POS: ✅ Display Successful Payment
    Note over Patron: ✅ Display Successful Payment

children.value: The Patron presents a Barcode for the POS to scan.
While the POS continues to poll, the Patron
When the Payment Request status is
, the POS stops polling and displays confirmation of the successful payment.
Quick Pay is used to immediately confirm the payment without requiring Patron approval.
The Patron’s barcode must be linked to an asset type that allows Quick Pay in order to use this flow. See
for the list of asset types that support Quick Pay.

props.code:
sequenceDiagram
    autonumber

    participant Patron
    participant POS
    participant Centrapay

    Note over Patron: Present Barcode
    Patron->>POS: Scan Barcode

    POS->>Centrapay: Create Payment Request with Barcode

    loop
        POS->>Centrapay: Poll for Payment Confirmation
        note over Centrapay: Automatically Confirm the Payment
    end

    Note over POS: ✅ Display Successful Payment
    Note over Patron: ✅ Display Successful Payment

children.value: note over Centrapay: Automatically Confirm the Payment
The Patron presents a Barcode for the POS to scan.
When Centrapay receives the first attempt to poll the Payment Request, it will automatically trigger payment. After payment is successful and the Payment Request status is
; the POS stops polling and displays confirmation of the successful payment.
in order to get further details about a barcode before it creates a Payment Request. For example, the POS can use the barcode
to apply any provider-specific discounts before creating the Payment Request.

props.code:
sequenceDiagram
    autonumber

    participant Patron
    participant POS
    participant Centrapay

    Note over Patron: Present Barcode
    Patron->>POS: Scan Barcode

    POS->>Centrapay: Decode Barcode
    Note over POS: Apply Provider Discounts

    POS->>Centrapay: Create Payment Request with Barcode
